verses.verse: [A psalme of Asaph.] God standeth in the congregation of God: he iudgeth in the midst of God.
Howe long wyll ye geue wrong iudgement: and accept the persons of the vngodly? Selah.
Iudge ryght vnto the poore and fatherlesse: dispatch according to iustice suche as be afflicted and in necessitie.
Deliuer the poore and outcast: saue them from the hande of the vngodly.
They knowe nothyng, they vnderstande nothing: they walke on styll in darknesse, [wherfore] all the foundations of the earth be out of course.
I haue sayde ye are gods: and ye all are chyldren of the most highest.
But ye shall dye lyke as a man [doth:] and princes them selues shall fall away lyke as other [do.]
Arise O God, and iudge thou the earth: for thou shalt take all Heathen to thine inheritaunce.
